body_html:
@ngimel Good idea, I'll try that and see what happens.

@thatguymike CPU type is AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core Processor. 16 gb of ram, 2x GTX 1080TI

(root) pytorch@pytorch-desktop:~/multigpu-test$ lspci -t -vv

@thatguymike CPU type is AMD Ryzen 7 1700 Eight-Core Processor. 16 gb of ram, 2x GTX 1080TI
